content: this simple and elegant stole is crocheted in fingering weight yarn then blocked for maximum laciness and beauty the pattern can be easily altered to make a small scarf or a large wrap depending on the number of motifs crocheted length- and widthwise many different types and gauges of yarn can also be used to suit anyone s taste appropriate for advanced beginners on up the pattern is available in charted form only available free for personal noncommercial use only
